question: The Cabinet Committee on Economic Affairs (CCEA) approved a ₹1285 Cr project of Aligarh-Harduaganj flyover, which is proposed to be located in which state?
explanation:
The Cabinet Committee on Economic Affairs chaired by Prime Minister Narendra Modi approved the construction of 22 km-long railway flyover between Aligarh-Harduaganj in Uttar Pradesh. 
The project entails an estimated cost of ₹1,285 crore to remove traffic jam in the area. This project is expected to curb the delays and detention of trains at Aligarh junction. The flyover project is expected to be completed by 2024-25.
